item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Hey, thanks for the offer, but seriously, I'm looking for another internet service provider now. Why? Here is the story:
Dec 29 I chat with Comcast presentative online asking if I can get something close to the $69.99 promotion (I was paying $116, tax included a month for both Internet and cable), I was told it is impossible to get any cable deal better than what I had (more than $60 a month).
Dec 30 I called DirectTV struck a deal
Dec 31 DirectTV installed everything
Dec 31 I chat with another Comcast representative again to cancel my cable, and asked if I can get a better deal for Internet, I was given $29.99, which seems not bad. However, I have to call Comcast's 1800 number to cancel my cable service to make sure my service won't be interrupt, fair enough.
Jan 1~3 holiday
Jan 4 I called the 1800 number, and was told $29.99 Internet is promotion price for a bundle, which means I cannot get it as I canceled my cable, so I still need to pay nearly $50 for my Internet service.
My current solution is that I have to stick with Comcast as I don't have any backup plan yet, but as I mentioned, I will shop around to see if I can get anything even a penny cheaper.
Right, I'm not happy with what happened to me.
